content:
Hi All,
Anyone else from Hong Kong here?
me and @Shing Tak Lam I believe

Awesome!
Have you been using Lean for long? Just playing or using it for some projects?
I have been using Lean for 3 years and I contribute to mathlib.
That is great. Maybe we could have a meetup in Hong Kong once the Covid situation levels off a bit.
for now you can join the discord server!

Kenny Lau said:

me and Shing Tak Lam I believe

I'm indeed from HK but I can't go back atm :(
Anyone in HK and eager to get a study group ?
Hey! sure

Antoine de Saint Germain said:

Anyone in HK and eager to get a study group ?

:wave:
Sure lol
Hello!

Little reminder that today at 2pm HKT we have our weekly Lean workshop in HKU. Anyone and everyone welcome ! We'll be working on formalising frieze patterns (c.f. https://github.com/Antoine-dSG/frieze_patterns)
Our regular meeting are happening again ! In HKU, every Wednesday from 3pm to 5pm, in Room 102 of Elliot Hall. Everyone is welcome
Ah, just learned about this thread. Unfortunately leaving Sunday night...
Hi! I am new to Lean. I graduated from HKUST, studied physics, and now work as a programmer. I want to contribute to PhysLean in my spare time.
Interesting to find someone under Prof Xuhua He's research group here. I was Prof He's student for 3 course (including 2 PG courses that he allowed a UG(me) to take) back in HKUST.

CY Fung said:

Hi! I am new to Lean. I graduated from HKUST, studied physics, and now work as a programmer. I want to contribute to PhysLean in my spare time.

Hi,

I'm likely to return to Hong Kong over Christmas, will be happy to meet! If there are other lean ppl in HK would love to meet them as well :)
@Antoine de Saint Germain still there?
Yes!
Hi all, I'm in HK from 15-21 January, wondering if anyone wants to have a meet up?

Antoine de Saint Germain said:

Our regular meeting are happening again ! In HKU, every Wednesday from 3pm to 5pm, in Room 102 of Elliot Hall. Everyone is welcome

@Antoine de Saint Germain Are these meetings still going on?
Otherwise, if people have a day job we can meet over the weekend (say 17/1)

ZhiKai Pong said:

Hi all, I'm in HK from 15-21 January, wondering if anyone wants to have a meet up?

I will in HK 15-17, we can meet up then!

ZhiKai Pong said:

Antoine de Saint Germain said:

Our regular meeting are happening again ! In HKU, every Wednesday from 3pm to 5pm, in Room 102 of Elliot Hall. Everyone is welcome

Antoine de Saint Germain Are these meetings still going on?

So far no, but we should really get it back on :smiling_face:

Antoine de Saint Germain said:

will in HK 15-17, we can meet up then!

Sounds good! I'm happy to come to HKU, but open to meeting elsewhere as well
And if anyone else wants to join please do reply!
@Antoine de Saint Germain I prefer 16/17 (but 15 is ok as well), which day is better for you? Let's say afternoon for an hour or two?
Letâ€™s do Friday 16th, at 3pm in HKU?
Sure see you there!
